name: WebMeridian
tagline: Magento and e-commerce solutions, Web development
description:
We are Ukrainian web-agency with development office located in Kharkiv, established in 2015.
We design, build and support and provide e-commerce solutions for the retail and wholesale brands.  We are highly specialized and focused in our field of expertise — online selling technology, providing service and product solutions for our clients from the delivery center in Ukraine as well as front / sales office in Germany. 
We implement e-commerce solutions using a stack of technologies like CMS based platforms such as Magento, WooCommerce, and others frameworks based solutions. Our core technology is CMS Magento. 
We are different from most of the Сolleagues and competitors in our industry: we are focusing on our work and love businesses we are helping to launch. 
We provide for our team members opportunities of discovering their capacities, grow as talented professionals and achieve great results for our clients. We don't like words "average". We work and achieve best results and quality for our solutions.
